@qiluo-msft could you please help to review or suggest a reviewer ?

@stepanblyschak , please check my PR for this issue: https://github.com/sonic-net/SONiC/pull/989

My solution is to remove the endless loop in swsscommon API, so any code using swsscommon not need any code change and the issue will be resloved.

> @stepanblyschak , please check my PR for this issue: [sonic-net/SONiC#989](https://github.com/sonic-net/SONiC/pull/989)
> 
> My solution is to remove the endless loop in swsscommon API, so any code using swsscommon not need any code change and the issue will be resloved.

@liuh-80 Which PR are you refering to?

> 
The most biggest different of my PR is not use the interrupt_on_signal and remove the loop, since keep the loop is necessary, so I will approve this PR:
https://github.com/Azure/sonic-swss-common/pull/629
Could you merge latest master?
